DOC.brief_title: Does Femoral Head Size Can Predict Cup Size ?
DOC.detailed_description: Methods This retrospective study , include patient underwent primary cementless THA due end-stage hip osteoarthritis 2011 2013 . Inclusion criterion : Patients underwent primary THA due end-stage primary osteoarthritis ; Males females 15-90 year age . Data collection The follow data collect : patient ' characteristic include gender , age surgery side surgery ; implant information include cup model , plan cup size , actual cup size , shell type outer diameter size ( mm ) ; actual femoral head diameter size ( mm ) ; difference plan cup size actual cup size use ; difference actual femoral head diameter size measure end surgery cementless implant cup outer diameter size ; difference actual femoral head diameter size plan cup size..
DOC.criteria: Patients underwent primary Total hip arthroplasty due endstage primary osteoarthritis ; Significant distortion femoral head . Previous reconstructive surgery radial osteotomy hip socket .
